channel.title: Linux on The Dev Haus
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on The Dev Haus

item.title: Search and Replace Bash
item.description: Search/replace string recursively in Linux grep -rnw ./*.* -e "string-to-search" Replace all occurrences bash sed -i 's/FROM/WITH/g' filenamePattern For e.g. sed -i 's/ash@gmail.com/someone@outloo.com/g' *.txt
